We’ll get back to you Shortly Contact Us General info@enigma.tl Sales sales@enigma.tl Careers careers@enigma.tl Corporate Headquarters Abu Dhabi, UAE DD-15-134-004-007, Level 15, WeWork Hub71, Al Khatem Tower, Abu Dhabi Global Market Square, Al Maryah Island, Abu Dhabi, UAE Offices Beirut/Lebanon Rennes/France Let's work together Name Email Phone Number Company Title Message “ Sometimes it is the people no one can imagine anything of who do the things no one can imagine .” Alan Mathison Turing was highly influential in the development of theoretical computer science, providing a formalization of the concepts algorithm and computation with the Turing machine, which can be considered a model of a general-purpose computer He cracked the ENIGMA code. Turing is widely considered to be the father of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence Copyright ©2021 Enigma All Rights Reserved Discover ENIGMA Home About Enigma Technology Solutions Careers Contact Us Automation is the name of the game Real-Time Business, Services and Network Analytics Home About Enigma Technology Solutions Careers Contact Us We use cookies on our website to give you the most relevant experience by remembering your preferences and repeat visits. By clicking “Accept”, you consent to the use of ALL the cookies. Cookie settings ACCEPT Privacy & Cookies Policy Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. Necessary Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information. Non-necessary Non-necessary Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website. SAVE & ACCEPT

Enigma | Support Data Solutions GTM Solutions Payments Solutions Onboarding &Â KYB Payment Risk & Underwriting Customer & Transaction Screening Developers Docs APIÂ Reference APIÂ Status Resources Blog Case Studies Charts Webinars Reports and Guides Press Partners Pricing Contact Us Sign In Support How can we help? Change the name in my account profile Log into your Enigma account In the upper right corner, click the profile menu icon and select Account In the Personal Info section, enter the new name in the Full Name field (thereâs no need to re-enter your email address) Click Update Information Change my password If you know your existing password and want to change it, you can do so in the Account section of the dashboard. Log into your Enigma account. In the upper right corner, click the profile menu icon and select Account. Click Change Password. Enter your old password and a new password that meets the security requirements. Click Change Password. If you have forgotten your Enigma password, make sure you are logged out of your account then reset your password here . Change my email address Log into your Enigma account. In the upper right corner, click the profile menu icon and select Account. Enter the new email address in the Email Address field and click Update Information. Check the new email address for an email with a confirmation code. Click the link in the email, and enter the code when requested. Use the new email address to log in moving forward. Close my account To close your account please contact support@enigma.com or fill out the form below. See when my account has hit the API usage limit You can view your API usage in the Console dashboard in the API Usage section. Youâll also receive a code 429 error in your API call that says: {"message":"Limit Exceeded"} Upgrade my account Free trial API access is capped at 100 monthly calls. To make more than 100 calls, add valid payment information to your account (at this time, we only accept credit cards). Once youâve added your payment information, youâll be able to make unlimited calls on a pay-per-use basis. Your first 100 calls each month are always free and registered users have unlimited access to Enigmaâs free products. Add payment information Log into your Enigma account. Click Upgrade from your homepage or click Admin in the lower left corner and select Payment Details. Enter the payment information for a valid credit card. At this time, we can only accept credit cards. Click to submit the payment information and confirm the upgrade. How billing works Users are charged on the first of each month for the total API calls made during the previous billing cycle. The first 100 calls each month are always free and registered users have unlimited access to Enigmaâs free API products for no cost. Weâll send an itemized receipt to the email associated with your account. To view the billing history with all of your past receipts, click Admin in the lower right corner of the Console and select Invoices. Learn more about available datasets and attributes The Enigma API provides access to our linked data asset of more than 30 million businesses. Discover more about our data sources and the data attributes we provide. Learn more about match and verification rates The Enigma Verify API provides match scores and verification scores. A match score measures the closeness of your API inputs to the company as it is represented in our data sets. The inputs require at least two of the following: person name, company name, and company address. A verification score is our measure of the company's authenticity as a real and active business. This score is calculated based on four measures: data freshness (timeliness of business' appearance in our data sets), data footprint (extent to which the business appears in many sources), source quality (appearance of the business in the most trusted and accurate sources), the business' activity (active, inactive, or N/A). Reporting security incidents If you suspect a security issue or anyone in your organization's Enigma account may have been compromised, please contact Enigma support at security@enigma.com . If you are a security researcher who has potentially discovered a security weakness or vulnerability in Enigma's systems, please send an email to security@enigma.com with information and we will provide information on secure responsible disclosure. Also feel free to e-mail us if you have any questions. Request a sales conversation To request a call about Enigma API packages and integrations, email contact@enigma.com . â Other questions? Get in touch. Data &Â Solutions Data GTM Solutions Payments Solutions Onboarding & KYB Payment Risk & Underwriting Customer &Â Transaction Screening Industries Resources Blog Case Studies Charts Business Directory Press Company About Us Pricing Contact Us Partners Careers Developers Docs APIÂ Reference APIÂ Status Privacy Policy Terms of Service Security Support Do Not Sell My Info SECURITY Security Overview Enigma utilizes Amazon's top-tier secure cloud services. Enigmaâs DaaS (Data as a Service) solution is utilizing top-tier secure cloud services provided by Amazon Web Services (AWS). We take our customersâ trust seriously. Enigma is trusted by multiple Fortune 500 companies across various industries and some of the countryâs largest financial institutions. Our security program is built to exceed their highest security requirements. Data Security Data transport At Enigma, sensitive information is transported over the internet or other public communications only if it is encrypted in transit. Communications between customer and Enigma are encrypted using transport layer security (TLS) encryption for web communication sessions. Enigma regularly updates TLS configuration to ensure only secure encryption ciphers are in use. Enriching customer data with Enigma's attributes is secure and easy with the console's(link: https://console.enigma.com ) secure file exchange feature. Users can upload data using a common file format and securely transmit it through their web browser directly to Enigma's servers. As with other communications, this system uses HTTPS (TLSv1.2+) to ensure the contents are encrypted in transit. Additionally, all files are subject to a scan for malware and viruses. Once on Enigma servers, the data is stored in our SOC 2-compliant production environment with a defense-in-depth strategy including strict access logs and regular audits of all relevant infrastructure. Encryption-at-rest All Enigma server storage is encrypted-at-rest, including any metadata, application data and virtual disks the Enigma servers at AWS use to operate. People All Enigma employees undergo background checks upon hiring and participate in our security training program. Security training program At Enigma, we incorporate security not just as a core feature of our technology, but also as a cornerstone of our company culture. All Engima employees receive security training upon hire and regularly thereafter. Employees have easy access to communication with security to handle any security questions or concerns as they arise. Software Security Pen-tests Enigmaâs SaaS applications undergo routine annual penetration tests by third-party security firms. Enigmaâs underlying infrastructure is augmented by Amazon AWSâs own independent compliance and security testing, and 24/7 monitoring of security-related events by dedicated teams. Monitoring & auditing Enigma has an extensive ongoing security and monitoring in place for its hosted application, including ongoing vulnerability scanning and Intrusion Detection System monitoring of the hosted environment. Enigmaâs security team is alerted to the presence of any anomalies when accessing internal infrastructure, such as including identification of suspicious signs such as failed login attempts, logins from unknown and off-premise IP addresses or logins during off-hours. Enigma's Responsibilities Safeguard your data once you upload it to Enigma Ensure up-to-date encryption ciphers are used to protect customer data Scan and test our web application and infrastructure for vulnerabilities and resolve any issues Make sure our service is operating properly Keep up with industry best practices regarding security Inform you of any security incidents that might affect your organization Customer's Responsibilities Keeping Enigma API keys and credentials safe and not sharing them Making sure devices you use Enigma with are up-to-date, safe to use and free of malware, etc Training your staff on cybersecurity awareness and best practices Inform Enigma of any security incidents, issues or concerns related to using Enigma Reporting security incidents If you suspect a security issue or anyone in your organization's Enigma account may have been compromised, please contact Enigma support at security@enigma.com . If you are a security researcher who has potentially discovered a security weakness or vulnerability in Enigma's systems, please send an email to security@enigma.com with information and we will provide information on secure responsible disclosure. Also feel free to e-mail us if you have any questions. Portal About Us Blog Contact Us Pay Rent Contact Us Connect with Enigma: Your Gateway to Exceptional Living Send us your message and we'll get your questions answered as soon as possible. Get in Touch Reach us at contact@rentenigma.com and we will get back to you asap. Working at Enigma? Visit our careers page or send us an email at careers@rentenigma.com . Your privacy matters to us. When you submit the contact form we assure you that your personal information provided will be used solely for the purpose of addressing your inquiry or request. We will not share or sell your information without your explicit consent. We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data, but please be aware that no transmission over the internet is entirely secure. By submitting the form, you agree to these terms -for more details. please refer to our privacy policy. Contact Us Careers Privacy Policy © All Rights Reserved. Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Join now Sign in Amazon and Meta partner to link Facebook and Instagram accounts with Amazon Report this article EnigmaData EnigmaData Maximize your Growth on E-Commerce Published Nov 11, 2023 + Follow Amazon and Meta have partnered to link Facebook and Instagram accounts with Amazon, enable on-platform commerce, and share data for ad targeting. This will have a huge impact on the e-commerce industry, synergizing Meta and Amazon advertising will give close competition to the Ad giant, Google. Nevertheless, it will be a win-win situation for all the brands and sellers out there on Amazon. This means that - This integration will automatically lead to new and more traffic flowing into Amazon, the heavy user base of Facebook & Instagram. Sellers get ready to churn out more spends and mint even more profits. Tapping into new user/customer segments, who are more into Insta shopping. Now it will be easier to allow shops to sell goods on Facebook and Instagram without creating custom storefronts on those apps. It will help sellers to improve their conversion volume with an increase in their visibility. Insta can build algorithms in the future to show product ads based on the user behavior & browsing which can lead to frequent and impulse buying decisions. This Meta-Amazon synergy can redefine the e-commerce landscape, creating a seamless bridge between advertising and shopping. It's a bold move towards a more integrated digital marketplace. How EnigmaData can help brands & sellers in this scenario? EnigmaData has data integration with Insta, Facebook & Amazon. Thus tracking all imp ad metrics in one single dashboard. Eliminate the need to log into separate ad portals. Smart Data Analytics is the USP of EnigmaData, we help to take the right & calculated decision when it comes to spending that hard-earned money on advertising. Track the visibility of your products across multiple platforms with ease. Want to know more?
